Package de.oth.blocklib.networking

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ClientNetworkLayer
    Interface defining operations which network layers for clients must support.
    NetworkConnection
    Encapsulates a connection between two endpoints.
    NetworkManager.AcknowledgeListener
    Callback for getting notified when the remote endpoint received a message.
    NetworkManager.ConnectionChangedListener
    Callback for detecting connection state changes.
    NetworkManager.MessageListener
    Callback for receiving messages from the network.
    ServerNetworkLayer
    Interface defining operations which network layers for servers must support.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClientNetworkManager
    Manager class for the client's network operations.
    Get an instance by using the NetworkManagerBuilder.
    NetworkManager
    Abstract base class for both ClientNetworkManager and ServerNetworkManager
    Implements core features both NetworkManagers need.
    Defines constants needed by both NetworkManagers.
    NetworkManagerBuilder
    Builds a ClientNetworkManager or a ServerNetworkManager used for network communications.
    Choose a network layer used to transport the messages between client and server.
    NetworkMessage
    Encapsulates a network message.
    Custom messages transporting information between the client and the server should implement this interface.
    ServerNetworkManager
    Manager class for the server's network operations.
    Get an instance by using the NetworkManagerBuilder.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    NetworkConnection.ConnectionState  
    NetworkLayerType
    Defines possible network layers for transporting messages between client and server.
